PHRASE.LANG: A highly lethal experimental Imperial unit that has the ability to teleport. These deadly units were created by Darth Vader and given to Boba Fett to help track down Juno Eclipse and Starkiller.[#Legal]

Une unité Impériale expérimentale et extrêmement meurtrière ayant la capacité de se téléporter. Ces unités mortelles ont été créées par Dark Vador et fournies à Boba Fett pour l'aider à retrouver Juno Eclipse et Starkiller.[#Legal]

Eine extrem tödliche Imperiale Versuchseinheit, die Teleportation benutzen kann. Diese Einheiten wurden von Darth Vader erschaffen und Boba Fett überlassen, um Juno Eclipse und Starkiller aufzuspüren.[#Legal]

Un'unità imperiale sperimentale e letale che ha la capacità di teletrasportarsi. Queste unità letali sono state create da Darth Vader e consegnate a Boba Fett per aiutarlo a trovare Juno Eclipse e Starkiller[#Legal]

Una unidad imperial experimental y extremadamente letal que tiene la habilidad de teletransportarse. Estas unidades letales fueron creadas por Darth Vader y cedidas a Boba Fett para ayudar a localizar a Juno Eclipse y a Starkiller.[#Legal]

A highly lethal experimental Imperial unit that has the ability to teleport. These deadly units were created by Darth Vader and given to Boba Fett to help track down Juno Eclipse and Starkiller.[#Legal]

A highly lethal experimental Imperial unit that has the ability to teleport. These deadly units were created by Darth Vader and given to Boba Fett to help track down Juno Eclipse and Starkiller.[#Legal]
